pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cluster Ordinal Data via Proportional Odds or Ordered Stereotype // Biclustering, row clustering and column clustering using the proportional odds model (POM), ordered stereotype model (OSM) or binary model for ordinal categorical data. Fernndez, D., Arnold, R., Pledger, S., Liu, I., Costilla, R. (2019) doi:10.1007/s11634-018-0324-3.
